pullrequest.title: First step in transition to ign-math

content.raw: Almost all of the examples that use `pkg-config` to find gazebo are being converted to cmake `find_package`, with the exception of `stand_alone/custom_main_pkgconfig`. I assume this is going to be a new trend in how we set up these examples?
content.html: Almost all of the examples that use pkg-config to find gazebo are being converted to cmake find_package, with the exception of stand_alone/custom_main_pkgconfig. I assume this is going to be a new trend in how we set up these examples?
